```{r}
#df <- rbind(c(1, 0, 1, 0), c(1, 0, 1, 1), c(0, 0, 1, 1))
df <- rbind(c(0,1,0,0,0,1,0,0,1), c(0,0,1,0,0,0,0,0,1), c(1,1,0,0,0,1,0,0,0))
df
```


```{r}
df_crossprod <- tcrossprod(df)
df_crossprod
```

```{r}
im <- which(df_crossprod > 0, arr.ind=TRUE)
im
```

```{r}
b = rowSums(df)
b
```

```{r}
Aim = df_crossprod[im]
Aim
```

```{r}
J = sparseMatrix(
          i = im[,1],
          j = im[,2],
          x = Aim / (b[im[,1]] + b[im[,2]] - Aim),
          dims = dim(df_crossprod)
    )
J
```

```{r}
library(recommenderlab)
```

```{r}
df_RatingMat <- as(df, "realRatingMatrix")
df
```

```{r}
rec_simMat <- similarity(df_RatingMat, y = NULL, method = "jaccard", args = NULL)
rec_simMat
J
```
